titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)

titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation whereas we have been inform'd, that a false, scandalous, and seditious libel ... intituled An account of the proceedings of the House of Commons in relation to the recoining the clipp'd money, and falling the price of guineas ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information taken from first five lines of text.
"Given at our court at Kensington the fifth day of November, 1696, in the eighth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
